title: Dreams Linux 1.0 stable i686
description:
Hello friends it's the first days of Dreams Linux ir's a Gnu/Linux destro

based on xubuntu :

About us

Dreams Linux is a linux distro based on ubuntu 12.04. Our goal is to provide not only a general purpose distro suitable for all kinds of users(amateurs,tweakers,artists,programmers etc) but also a rock solid,lightweight and visually appealing one.

Support

Release Info&Features: Dreams 1.0 LTS
*Kernel 3.2.0.56 LTS
*Xfce 4.10
*Thunar File Manager
*Xfwm4 Window Manager
*A variety of applications

(Libreoffice,kdenlive,firefox ,Blender ,gimp inkscape....etc)

*Conky enabled by default (conky-manager)
*A nice splash screen
* i686 and i386 (32bit) architecture only

the offeciall web site http://dreamslinux.ml/
